result.execSummary:
The defendant Travis Lee Boman was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Per bond signed by DE.  gll
Status conference on February 18, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO ABUSIVE CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, M.C.  The term "abusive contact" is hereby defined as a verbal assault or an intentional infliction of or threat to inflict physical pain, physical injury or illness, an impairment of physical condition, and /or sexual contact or sexual intercourse without consent.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats. THIS CONDITION SHALL ONLY BE EFFECTIVE UPON THE EXPIRATION OF A 72 HOUR NO CONTACT ORDER.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

02:01 PM  CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Lindabaur. ADA:  Bela Alexander Ballo   DF ATTY: Abrianna Dolfi and Kaitlin Dippolito for today     Travis Lee Boman appeared. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Defendant qualifies for PD. Bond argument; bond ordered. Money on file to be returned to payor. NG. Reserve on pre-plea rights. Waive speedy trial. Court sets STC via Zoom to check on potential motions. Adjourned at 2:07 PM.  gll  Status conference scheduled for February 18, 2022 at 04:00 pm.
